mapper.select: SELECT DTL.TEN_ID , DTLMULT.LANG_CCD , DTL.CCD , DTL.DTLCD AS DATA , DTLMULT.DTLCD_NM , DTLMULT.DTLCD_NM AS LABEL , DTL.DTLCD_SORT , DTL.RMK , DTL.USE_YN , DTL.MODR_ID FROM DTLCD DTL , DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLMULT WHERE DTL.TEN_ID = DTLMULT.TEN_ID AND DTL.CCD = DTLMULT.CCD AND DTL.DTLCD = DTLMULT.DTLCD AND DTL.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL.STS <> 'D' AND DTL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTL.CCD = #{p.grp_cd} AND DTLMULT.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ORDER BY DTL.DTLCD_SORT
